alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:29AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTY THROUGH 300 AM CDT... At 229 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Two Harbors, or 31 miles northeast of Superior, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Two Harbors, Silver Bay, Beaver Bay, Castle Danger, Highland Lake, Split Rock Lighthouse, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Alger, Gooseberry Falls State Park, Wales, and Split Rock Lighthouse State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
